# EasyNPTEL

Making NPTEL Downloads easy.  


It's tedious when you have to download all the video lectues of a particular NPTEL course. This project is aimed at making the NPTEL course videos downloads easy. Provide the url of your NPTEL course, now sit back and relax. All the videos of the course will be downloaded with ease now.

##How to use?

1. Download the NPTEL.py file.
2. Run the file as you would run any other python file. (`python NPTEL.py`)
3. Enter the url when prompted.
4. Done!

##Requirements:
Only Python.
